reviews.review_msg:
Took this class last year. A great class to take if you want your insomnia cured or interested in the paranormal pseudoscience

The textbook is a better teacher and has concise information albeit from an American context.

She focused on curriculum and teaching theory. Her class was graded by several group projects, all of which are easy to succeed for students with an interest in education. Many international students also took the class as a grade booster which makes it even easier to score well for education students.
